content: this *moon amigurumi* is perfect for making baby mobiles pacifier chains stroller toy chains or keychain holder backpack charms christmas tree ornaments etc *this pattern is written in us terms* **materials** any yarn appropriate hook size tapestry needle stitch marker stuffing optional black embroidery floss pink yarn **yarn** for the moons in the pictures i used schachenmayr catania 137 yds / 125 m per 50 g in vanille 403 hobbii rainbow cotton 8/6 115 yds / 105 m per 50 g in pastel yellow 53 paintbox yarns simply aran 201 yds / 184 m per 100 g in vanilla cream 207 hobbii baby snuggle super bulky 131 yds / 120 m per 100 g in baby duck 7 **gauge & size** this pattern is too small to accurately determine the gauge below you can find the approximate sizes of the moon crocheted with different yarn and hook combinations sport 2 fine yarn 2 5 mm 12 uk 2 5 cm by 2 25 5 7 cm dk 3 light yarn 3 0 mm 11 uk 2 25 5 7 cm by 2 75 7 cm aran 4 medium yarn 3 5 mm e/4 us 9 uk 3 7 6 cm by 3 5 8 9 cm super bulky 5-6 wpi 5 5 mm i/9 us 5 uk 5 12 7 cm by 6 15 2 cm **copyright** please remember that this pattern and the pictures shown here are the property of raffamusadesigns com feel free to use the patterns to make and sell your finished products but you are not allowed to republish or distribute this pattern or parts of this pattern in any way please do not use photos from raffamusa designs in your listings **follow me** **blog** https //raffamusadesigns com/ **youtube** https //www youtube com/channel/uczqyp_l6lj8_ic3fcq30wjg **facebook** https //www facebook com/raffamusadesigns **instagram** https //www instagram com/raffamusa_designs/ **pinterest** https //www pinterest it/raffamusadesigns/_created/ **ravelry** https //www ravelry com/designers/raffaella-tassoni
